name: FreedomRPG
description:
This is a free short RPG showing the first part of the game showcasing how the game plays. It is a top down rpg where you follow the story of Jaques and his allies. You can use a set of abilities to kill enemies in various ways.

There might still be bugs since this is still early in development. Feedback would be amazing since this is basically my first game.

Game is playable on Windows only for now.

Expected play time for whole game is 40 mins - 1hr.
